dataList.content:
Rarely, you may obtain <color=#008d0d>[Huge Trinkets Sack]</color> from clearing Event Stages, Main Story Stages, or Story Dungeons.

<color=#008d0d>[Huge Trinkets Sack]</color> is converted to 20 <color=#008d0d>[Trinkets Sack]</color>.

Clear Event Stages, Main Story Stages, or Story Dungeons to earn <color=#008d0d>[Trinkets Sack]</color>.

You can redeem various rewards from the <color=#008d0d>[Gift Exchange]</color> based on the number of <color=#008d0d>[Trinkets Sack]</color> you have.
